title: Mode Selection
subheader: Select the operating mode for Wallet Ex, this can be changed at any time on the settings page.

simpleMode.title: Simple Mode
simpleMode.subheader: Easy sending, receiving and viewing of wallets. Uses a remote node or service and does not download the blockchain to your computer. Recommended if you're new to cryptocurrency.

fullNodeMode.title: Full Node Mode
fullNodeMode.subheader: Runs a full node to aid with decentralization and security. Downloads the entire blockchain to your computer.
